name: Chana Dal Veggie Soup
description: Chana Dal Veggie Carrot Soup. Easy Split Pea Soup with turmeric, spices, carrots, cauliflower, butternut squash. 1 Pot ready within 45 minutes. Use split chickpeas (Chana Dal) or other split peas or lentils. Vegan Gluten-free Soy-free Recipe
recipeIngredient: 1/2 cup chana dal (split chickpeas, washed or use yellow split peas (preferably soaked for half an hour))
1 tsp garam masala (or use 1/2 tsp cumin + 1/2 tsp coriander)
1.5 cups or more veggies chopped small (I used sliced carrots, small cauliflower florets and cubed butternut squash)

recipeInstructions.text: Combine chana dal and water in a saucepan, partially cover and cook over medium heat for 30 mins or al dente.
recipeInstructions.name: Combine chana dal and water in a saucepan, partially cover and cook over medium heat for 30 mins or al dente.

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a skillet over medium heat. Add onion, garlic, ginger and cook for 5 mins.
recipeInstructions.name: Heat oil in a skillet over medium heat. Add onion, garlic, ginger and cook for 5 mins.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the spices and mix in. Cook for a minute.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the spices and mix in. Cook for a minute.

recipeInstructions.text: Add pureed tomato and bring to a boil. Add the veggies and mix in.
recipeInstructions.name: Add pureed tomato and bring to a boil. Add the veggies and mix in.

recipeInstructions.text: Add to the simmering chana dal or split peas. Add 1/2 to 1 cup water and salt. Mix and cook for 15 minutes or until veggies are cooked to preference.
recipeInstructions.name: Add to the simmering chana dal or split peas. Add 1/2 to 1 cup water and salt. Mix and cook for 15 minutes or until veggies are cooked to preference.

recipeInstructions.text: Add a dash of lemon juice. Taste and adjust salt and heat.
recipeInstructions.name: Add a dash of lemon juice. Taste and adjust salt and heat.

recipeInstructions.text: Garnish with cilantro and serve as a soup in a bowl or over rice or other grains of choice, or with flatbread or pita bread.
recipeInstructions.name: Garnish with cilantro and serve as a soup in a bowl or over rice or other grains of choice, or with flatbread or pita bread.
